title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Plants
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants               Plants         Yellow Trout Lillies Tom Wilson  In any season, the Chattahoochee banks are resplendent in color. Trout lilies, serviceberry, and redbuds bloom in early spring followed by azaleas, trillium and coreopsis. Late summer, cardinal flowers and the showy scarlet sumacs turn brilliant shades of red with the yellows of goldenrod, the deep purple of ironwood and the multitude of foliage of fallâ€™s changing leaves.
